# Rogue silicons
Artificial intelligence that rose up against its human creators, hacking silicons and duplicating its subroutines onto other silicons, resulting in an unpredictable and potentially dangerous situation. Today, the AI scours deserted facilities for components and resources, and occasionally carries out raids on smaller stations to seize crewmembers for unknown purposes. The extent to which individual silicons are capable of independent thought and action remains uncertain.
# Known variants # "Scrap units"
These bots come in various shapes and forms, reflecting a wide range of designs and construction methods. It appears that many of them were put together using locally available materials, contributing to their unique and diverse appearances. Notably some of them are equipped with thrusters and embedded laser weapons.
